data.message: Pencil MCP supports NATIVE GRADIENT FILLS - no need to stack ellipses! Use fill: {type: "gradient", gradientType: "radial"|"linear"|"angular", center: {x, y}, size: {width, height}, colors: [{color, position}...]}. Center uses normalized 0-1 coordinates (0.5, 0.5 = center). For edge glow: set center at the edge (y:1 for bottom, y:0 for top). This gives true mathematical interpolation - perfectly smooth, no banding, fewer nodes.
